title: Affordable 10Gbps Router with SFP+ by TP-Link
author: PoDiax
content: The TP-Link BE800 is a game-changer for high-speed networks, offering 10Gbps connectivity at an affordable price. Features like an SFP+ port for fiber connections and robust performance make it a standout choice for enthusiasts and professionals alike. Check it out on: Amazon.com Amazon.pl

title: MSI MPG X870E CARBON WIFI â€“ Excellent Linux Compatibility!
author: PoDiax
content: I've tested numerous motherboards, and the MSI MPG X870E CARBON WIFI stands out as one of the best for my Arch Linux system. Not only does the WiFi work flawlessly, but I2C devices also run smoothly without causing crashes in my OpenRGB setup! The build quality is outstanding, and thanks to the robust X870E chipset from AMD, this motherboard is a future-proof choice for upgrades. Test Setup: Processor: Ryzen 7 7800 RAM: 32GB DDR5 @ 6200MHz If you're looking for a reliable Linux-compatible motherboard with top-notch performance, check it out: Amazon.com Amazon.pl
